name: Lost in Galaxy
description:
Platformer game I've made for a school project

Controls:

Move and Jump: WASD or Arrow Keys

Close Game: Escape

The music is by Chad Crouch from the album Arps:
-Illustrated Novel
-Algorithms
-Moonrise
-Organisms
-Shipping Lanes
